Function Documentation

BSPTree * speedtree::getBSPTree ( const char *  filename,
int  seed,
BoundingBox &  o_bbox 
)

Retrieves BSPTree for the specified SPT file.

Look for it in the local memory cache before trying to load from file.

Note:
this function is used only by the server. Client and tools get the BSP-tree using the SpeedTreeRenderer::bsp() function.
Parameters:
filename the name of the spt file used to load the tree.
seed the seed to be used when computing the tree.
o_bbox will hold the tree's bounding box.
Returns:
Pointer to BSPTree object (don't delete it).

BSPTreePtr speedtree::createBSPTree ( CSpeedTreeRT *  speedTree,
const char *  filename,
int  seed,
BoundingBox &  o_bbox 
)

Creates (or loads from file) a BSP-tree for the specified speedtree.

If a BSP-tree is compiled from the speedtree, this function will save the corresponding ".bsp2" file. No memory caching if performed.

Parameters:
speedTree the tree object.
filename the name of the spt file used to load the tree.
seed the seed to be used when computing the tree.
o_bbox will hold the tree's bounding box.
Note:
will throw std::runtime_error if tree can't be computed.

const char *  filename,
int  seed

template<typename TreePartTraits>
TreePartTraits::RenderDataType speedtree::getCommonRenderData ( CSpeedTreeRT &  speedTree,
const std::string &  datapath 
)

Retrieves basic render data from a speed tree from a speed tree object for a specific tree part.

Uses the trait object for that.

Parameters:
speedTree speedtree object where to get the data from.
datapath path where to look for aditional data files.
Returns:
a new RenderDataType object.

template<typename TreePartTraits>
TreePartTraits::RenderDataType speedtree::createPartRenderData ( CSpeedTreeRT &  speedTree,
CSpeedWind &  speedWind,
const std::string &  datapath 
)

Creates a render data object to render the part of a tree specified by the trait template parameter.

Parameters:
speedTree speedtree object where to get the data from.
speedWind SpeedTree wind object to use in wind calculations.
datapath path where to look for aditional data files.
Returns:
a new RenderDataType object.

LeafRenderData speedtree::createLeafRenderData ( CSpeedTreeRT &  speedTree,
CSpeedWind &  speedWind,
const std::string &  filename,
const std::string &  datapath,
int  windAnglesCount,
float &  leafRockScalar,
float &  leafRustleScalar 
)

Creates a render data object to render the leafs part of a tree.

Parameters:
speedTree speedtree object where to get the data from.
speedWind SpeedTree wind object to use for wind calculations.
filename name of the file from where the tree was loaded.
datapath path where to look for aditional data files.
windAnglesCount number of wind angles used to animate trees.
leafRockScalar (out) will store leaf's rock animation factor.
leafRustleScalar (out) will store leaf's rustle animation factor.
Returns:
The filled up LeafRenderData object.

speedtree::TreePartRenderData< speedtree::BillboardVertex > speedtree::createBillboardRenderData ( CSpeedTreeRT &  speedTree,
const std::string &  datapath 
)

Creates a render data object to render the billboard part of a tree.

Parameters:
speedTree speedtree object where to get the data from.
datapath path where to look for aditional data files.

std::string speedtree::createTreeDefName ( const char *  filename,
uint  seed 
)

Creates a string that uniquely identifies a tree loaded from the given filename and generated with the provided seed number.

Parameters:
filename full path to the SPT file used to load the tree.
seed seed number used to generate the tree.
Returns:
the requested string.
